text: One of the saddest and most heartfelt songs in all the SNES library.  This game had HEART, and this song reflects it...

text: My favorite Snes game.   I was a young child, 11 years old, and this song helped me process a lot of my emotional pain.  I love you all for sharing this little piece of amazing video game music history!
